service.name: checkSolrReady
service.description: Checks if Solr webapp is loaded and available for queries

attribute.name: ready
attribute.description: True if Solr is enabled, loaded and available

attribute.name: enabled
attribute.description: True if Solr is enabled, or it is registered as an application in the system (always true in stock Scipio config)

service.name: waitSolrReady
service.description: Returns only when Solr webapp is loaded and available for queries (returns failure if Solr is not registered in the system or other error)

attribute.name: sleepTime
attribute.description: Time (milliseconds) to wait between checks. Default: value of solrconfig.properties/solr.service.waitSolrReady.sleepTime

attribute.name: maxChecks
attribute.description: Max number of times to check (-1 for infinite), separated by sleepTime. If passes this, returns failure. Default: value of solrconfig.properties/solr.service.waitSolrReady.maxChecks

service.name: setSolrDataStatus
service.description: Set SOLR data status ID

service.name: reloadSolrSecurityAuthorizations
service.description: Reloads the security authorizations defined in security.json

service.name: rebuildSolrIndex
service.description: rebuild SOLR Index

attribute.name: clearAndUseCache
attribute.description: see solrconfig.properties/solr.index.rebuild.clearAndUseCache

attribute.name: waitSolrReady
attribute.description: If true, will wait for Solr to be loaded before running the indexing- see waitSolrReady service (added 2018-02-20)

service.name: rebuildSolrIndexIfDirty
service.description: rebuild SOLR Index if data status dirty (or unknown) OR if config change (2017-08-23)

attribute.name: clearAndUseCache
attribute.description: see solrconfig.properties/solr.index.rebuild.clearAndUseCache

service.name: rebuildSolrIndexAuto
service.description: rebuild SOLR Index - auto-run service

attribute.name: clearAndUseCache
attribute.description: see solrconfig.properties/solr.index.rebuild.clearAndUseCache

service.name: updateToSolrSingleInterface
service.description: Represents the updateToSolr options for a single product

attribute.name: action
attribute.description: Supported values: add (same as addToSolr), remove (same as removeFromSolr), auto (default - this either adds or removes based on whether or not the productId still exists in the database)

attribute.name: updateVariants
attribute.description: If true, also update the variant products immediately associated to this one (added 2018-07-19). (NOTE: ignored if effective action is product removal)

attribute.name: updateVariantsDeep
attribute.description: If true, also update the variant products associated to this one (added 2018-07-19), and their variants, etc. (NOTE: ignored if effective action is product removal)

attribute.name: updateVirtual
attribute.description: If true, also update the virtual product immediately associated to this one (added 2018-07-25). (NOTE: ignored if effective action is product removal)

attribute.name: updateVirtualDeep
attribute.description: If true, also update the virtual product associated to this one (added 2018-07-25), and its virtuals, etc. (NOTE: ignored if effective action is product removal)

service.name: updateToSolrMultiInterface
service.description: Attributes for multiple product update in a single invocation NOTE: As of 2018-07-25, this is the standard way the registerUpdateToSolr service uses to pass products to updateToSolr

attribute.name: productIdMap
attribute.description: Map of productIds to maps of updateToSolrSingleInterface values (added 2018-07-19)

attribute.name: manual
attribute.description: If true, add even if solr ECAs are configured off and don't mark dirty on fail (manual/debugging)

service.name: updateToSolr
service.description: Immediately adds OR removes product to/from solr index by product instance or by productId - intended for use with ECAs/SECAs

service.name: addToSolr
service.description: DEPRECATED (use updateToSolr instead): Immediately adds product to solr index by product instance or by productId - intended for use with ECAs/SECAs

service.name: removeFromSolr
service.description: DEPRECATED (use updateToSolr instead): Immediately removes product from solr index by product instance or by productId - intended for use with ECAs/SECAs

service.name: registerUpdateToSolr
service.description: Registers (queues) a product add or removal to/from solr index by product instance or by productId - intended for use with ECAs/SECAs - delays the solr index update (updateToSolr) to the current transaction's global-commit

attribute.name: noTransMode
attribute.description: Determines what to do if no transaction is in place. Supported values: update (adds/remove to solr immediately even if no tx), mark-dirty (marks solr data dirty, IF not in manual mode).

attribute.name: updateSrv
attribute.description: Name of service implementing updateToSolr's interface to delegate to for the solr index update. Default: value of solrconfig.properties/solr.service.registerUpdateToSolr.updateSrv, or updateToSolr.

service.name: solrProductAttributesSimple
service.description: Simple-type product attributes for addToSolrIndex Product

service.name: solrProductAttributesComplex
service.description: Complex-type product attributes for addToSolrIndex Product

service.name: solrProductAttributes
service.description: All product attributes for addToSolrIndex Product

service.name: addToSolrIndex
service.description: Add a Product to Solr Index

attribute.name: fields
attribute.description: A map of pre-formatted fields to add as-is to the solr document for indexing, with no field renaming or Solr type abstraction (added 2018-02-05)

attribute.name: sku
attribute.description: DEPRECATED (2017-08-17): unused

attribute.name: cat
attribute.description: DEPRECATED (2017-08-17): unused

attribute.name: image
attribute.description: DEPRECATED (2017-08-17): unused

service.name: addListToSolrIndex
service.description: Add a List of Products to Solr Index and flush after all have been added

service.name: runSolrQuery
service.description: Run a query on Solr and return the results

attribute.name: queryFilter
attribute.description: WARN: for legacy code reasons, this string is split on whitespace to produce multiple filters. To avoid splitting, use queryFilters instead (with one entry).

attribute.name: queryFilters
attribute.description: List of strings, each used as-is as a filter (no splitting).

attribute.name: queryType
attribute.description: Name of a request handler defined in solrconfig.xml (starts with /)

attribute.name: defType
attribute.description: Query language def handler type (dismax, edismax, ...), overrides the request handler

attribute.name: defaultOp
attribute.description: OR or AND (default depends on configuration, usually OR); NOTE: Not honored by all defTypes (edismax supports)

attribute.name: queryFields
attribute.description: For edismax defType only: the target fields to query, usually space-separated ("qf" parameter)

attribute.name: queryParams
attribute.description: Optional manual extra query options; NOTE: using above options is preferred when possible for better future-proofing of queries

attribute.name: solrUsername
attribute.description: Username for Solr basic authentication (default: solrconfig.properties/solr.query.login.username)

attribute.name: solrPassword
attribute.description: Password for Solr basic authentication (default: solrconfig.properties/solr.query.login.password)

attribute.name: errorType
attribute.description: "query-syntax" for query syntax error, "general" otherwise (if error occurred) (added 2017-08-25)

attribute.name: nestedErrorMessage
attribute.description: Specific error message for the error, IF available (added 2017-08-25)

attribute.name: productStore
attribute.description: Product store (used to determine the product filtering defaults)

attribute.name: useDefaultFilters
attribute.description: If true, unless overridden with the explicit filter flags, the product stock and discontinuation filters are applied based on the ProductStore configuration; if false, filters are not applied unless explicitly requested with the explicit filter flags (default: true)

attribute.name: useStockFilter
attribute.description: If true, filter out products with no inventory (default: ProductStore.showOutOfStockProducts, or false)

attribute.name: useDiscFilter
attribute.description: If true, filter out products past their Product.salesDiscontinuationDate date (default: ProductStore.showDiscontinuedProductsDefault, or false)

attribute.name: excludeVariants
attribute.description: If true, exclude variant products (default: ProductStore.prodSearchExcludeVariants, or true)

attribute.name: queryFilters
attribute.description: List of strings, each used as-is as a filter (no splitting).
